content: Examine the WeatherViewSet in hunts/api_views.py to understand current implementation
Check hunts/tasks.py for weather fetching logic
Review hunts/models.py for Weather model structure
Check Django settings for weather API configuration
Check .env.local file for Visual Crossing API key configuration
Fix issues with weather data mapping between API response and Weather model
Add comprehensive error handling and logging
Add fallback mechanisms for when external API is unavailable
Update api_views.py to use the new fallback function
Create Django migration for Weather model changes
Test the weather API integration end-to-end
Create documentation for the weather API setup
